Container.Name: Z80Pack
Container.Overview: Z80Pack is an emulator for emulating CP/M 2, CP/M 3, and MP/M II on Linux. This is a command line Docker only, so you have to execute bash in the Docker. Install a command line plugin so you can run the Z80Pack commands in a window.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is used to store the disk configurations and CP/M and MP/M startup scripts.[br][br]
